Description of change
This PR uses Typescript to generate the language bundle which has the same data structure as the one generated by Purscript.   Some npm scripts have been updated accordingly.
I have not removed GenLangStrings.purs yet in this PR, but I can do this when all the changes are reviewed and approved.

nodes.bodyText:
Hmmm, I think we can improve on this tangle of tasks. Currently with your changes it looks like this:
"build": "npm-run-all build:*",
"build:bundles": "run-s bundle && cross-env-shell parcel build --public-url=. --out-dir=${npm_package_config_dist} ${npm_package_config_parcelEntryFiles}",
"build:langbundle": "cross-env-shell parcel build target/language_bundle/BuildLanguageBundle.js --no-minify --no-source-maps --target node --out-dir=target/tools && cross-env-shell \"node target/tools/BuildLanguageBundle.js > ${npm_package_config_buildlang}/jsbundle.json\"",
"compileps": "pulp build",
"bundle": "npm-run-all bundle:* && run-s bundleps",
"bundle:languagestring": "cross-env-shell tsc --types \"node\" --outDir target/language_bundle tsrc/util/BuildLanguageBundle.ts",
"bundleps": "npm-run-all compileps && npm-run-all --parallel bundleps:*",
"bundleps:uploadlist": "cross-env-shell \"purs bundle \"${npm_package_config_psglob}\" -m Uploads.UploadList --main Uploads.UploadList -o target/uploadlist.js\"",
I'd suggest something along the lines of:
"compile:ps": "pulp build",
"compile:langbundle-tool": "cross-env-shell tsc --types \"node\" --outDir target/language_bundle tsrc/util/BuildLanguageBundle.ts",
"build:langbundle-tool": "cross-env-shell parcel build target/language_bundle/BuildLanguageBundle.js --no-minify --no-source-maps --target node --out-dir=target/tools",
"build:langbundle": "cross-env-shell \"node target/tools/BuildLanguageBundle.js > ${npm_package_config_buildlang}/jsbundle.json\"",
"build:ps-uploadlist": "cross-env-shell \"purs bundle \"${npm_package_config_psglob}\" -m Uploads.UploadList --main Uploads.UploadList -o target/uploadlist.js\"",
"build:bundle": "cross-env-shell parcel build --public-url=. --out-dir=${npm_package_config_dist} ${npm_package_config_parcelEntryFiles}",
"build": "npm-run-all compile:* build:*"
There may be issues in the above as I've just hacked it out. But hopefully you can see what's happening there.
Also, if such a structure is arrived at, once the upload control is converted, you'd just remove compile:ps and build:ps-uploadlist.
Lastly, you'd want to consider putting the common path for the compiling/building/running of the language bundle tool into a config variable.
